won.title: Participants who won

no_participants_left.title: Error on picking a new winner
no_participants_left.text: It seems that there are no participants left who did not win so far. I guess the raffle is over now :).

unknown_error.title: Error on picking a new winner
unknown_error.text: We could not pick a new winner since an unknown error occurred. Please try reloading the page and try to pick a new winner.
